name: Nina
title: The Sniper Assassin
subtitle: A deadly marksman who excels at executing high-priority targets
lore: Nina is a professional assassin known for her exceptional marksmanship and tactical prowess. Armed with dual pistols and a sniper rifle, she combines precision shooting with agile movement to eliminate her targets. Her ability to quickly reposition and execute key targets makes her a feared presence on the battlefield.

passive.name: Dual Gun
passive.description: Nina starts with a bonus pistol in her inventory. When activated, her next basic attack will deal damage with both pistols.

Q.name: Sniper Shot
Q.description: Nina draws her sniper and fires in a long, narrow direction. If it hits an enemy, it deals [105/200/415/600/995] damage. If the enemy is below [16%] HP, it executes them. Sniper Shot counts as an auto attack.

W.name: Mark of The Assassin
W.description: Nina marks an enemy. She moves 25% faster towards this enemy and places a mark on them. If she hits this enemy with 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds, the third attack deals [90/155/355/510/895] bonus damage and she gains 5 bonus AD for the rest of the match.

E.name: Sudden Assault
E.description: Nina tumbles in the targeted direction. If she collides with an enemy, she stuns them for [1.35s].

R.name: Aid
R.description: Nina calls a helicopter to her current location, which arrives after 1 second. Re-activating this ability makes Nina jump onto the helicopter, allowing her to choose a drop-off point on the map. If no point is chosen, Nina lands at the base after 3.5 seconds. When Nina jumps onto the helicopter, she restores [80% HP and 100% Mana].

1.name: Double Tap
1.description: Nina's attack speed increases by [0.35] for [2] seconds after using Dual Gun.

1.name: Silent Step
1.description: Nina gains [25%] bonus movement speed while in the brush or after using Sudden Assault.

1.name: Focused Aim
1.description: Nina's Sniper Shot pierces through enemies, dealing [25%] damage to enemies behind the first target.

5.name: Enhanced Ammo
5.description: Sniper Shot now applies a [20%] slow for [2] seconds.

5.name: Keen Eye
5.description: Mark of The Assassin reveals the target and reduces their damage reduction by a maximum of [15%] for the duration of the mark.

5.name: Quick Reflexes
5.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sudden Assault by [1.5] seconds.

10.name: Even more Aid
10.description: Aid has 2 charges but it won't restore Nina anymore.

15.name: Tactical Retreat
15.description: Nina's Aid ability now grants her a [50%] movement speed boost for [3] seconds upon landing.

15.name: Lethal Strikes
15.description: Nina's Dual gun attacks deal [200% AD] damage.

15.name: No Escape
15.description: Nina roots the target for [1s] of her Assassin's mark if she hits all 3 auto-attacks.

20.name: Rapid Deployment
20.description: Aid's cooldown is reduced to [100s] and Nina gets [10%] damage reduction upon landing for [5s].

20.name: Critical Focus
20.description: Sniper Shot now executes at [14%] HP or below.

20.name: Overkill
20.description: Killing an enemy with Sniper Shot refunds the mana cost of the spell and sets its cooldown to [1s].

20.name: Peak Performance
20.description: Nina instantly reaches level 25 stats, but she won't scale upon leveling up.
